text.div:
Chikungunya Virus Disease (Tests for Chikungunya virus Nucleic Acid)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    51664-1 Chikungunya virus RNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    60260-7 Chikungunya virus RNA [Presence] in Serum or Plasma by NAA with probe detection
    81152-1 Chikungunya virus non-structural protein 1 (nsP1) RNA [Presence] in Serum by NAA with probe detection
    81153-9 Chikungunya virus non-structural protein 1 (nsP1) RNA [Presence] in Cerebral spinal fluid by NAA with probe detection
    86514-7 Chikungunya virus RNA [Presence] in Amniotic fluid by NAA with probe detection
    86515-4 Chikungunya virus RNA [Presence] in Urine by NAA with probe detection

name: Chikungunya Virus Disease (Tests for Chikungunya virus Nucleic Acid)
